articles.title: This ASX technology company's shares are surging more than 20% on a new contract win
articles.description: This ASX technology share is sharply higher after it announced it had struck a new deal with a UK hospitals operator.
articles.content:
Shares in Alcidion Group Ltd (ASX: ALC) are more than 20% higher after the company said it had been selected as the preferred supplier for a UK hospital group.

articles.content: LONDON, Jan 8 (Reuters) - Technology companies in Britain will be required to block unsolicited sexual images under online safety rules taking effect on Thursday, as governments worldwide step up efforts to curb abuse and risks linked to artificial i... [1717 chars]

articles.title: Ford's Leap Toward Level 3 Autonomy
articles.description: Ford Motor Company plans to introduce Level 3 driver-assistance technology in 2028, initially on a new electric pickup truck. The feature will not come standard but be available for an extra fee. Ford aims to develop the system in-house, using lidar technology, in a push toward affordability and reduced reliance on suppliers.
articles.content: Ford Motor Company announced its ambitious plan to launch Level 3 driver-assistance systems by 2028, allowing hands-free and eyes-off driving on select highways. This cutting-edge technology will debut on Ford's forthcoming affordable electric pickup... [743 chars]

articles.title: Tech firms must block unsolicited nude images under new UK rules
articles.description: Technology companies in Britain will be required to block unsolicited sexual images under online safety rules taking effect on Thursday, as governments worldwide step up efforts to curb abuse and risks linked to artificial intelligence.
articles.content: LONDON, Jan 8 (Reuters) - Technology companies in Britain will be required to block unsolicited sexual images under online safety rules taking effect on Thursday, as governments worldwide step up efforts to curb abuse and risks linked to artificial i... [1729 chars]

articles.title: FPIs dump FMCG, Financial Services in second half of December; IT sees inflows
articles.description: Foreign investors divested ₹16,848 crore from Indian markets in the latter half of December. FMCG and financial services saw major outflows. However, the information technology sector attracted ₹4,457 crore in inflows, marking the first positive fortnight since June. This shift indicates a change in global investor sentiment towards Indian equities.
articles.content:
Synopsis
Foreign investors divested ₹16,848 crore from Indian markets in the latter half of December. FMCG and financial services saw major outflows. However, the information technology sector attracted ₹4,457 crore in inflows, marking the first posi... [4109 chars]

articles.title: Ford Hints at Robotaxis With Plans for Eyes-Off-Road Technology
articles.description: Ford Motor Co. plans to debut technology in two years that will allow drivers to take their eyes off the road, which could lead the automaker into the emerging robotaxi business, according to a top executive.
articles.content:
Ford Motor Co. plans to debut technology in two years that will allow drivers to take their eyes off the road, which could lead the automaker into the emerging robotaxi business, according to a top executive.
Ford said Wednesday it will launch so-cal... [402 chars]

articles.title: Ford has an AI assistant and new hands-free BlueCruise tech on the way
articles.description: Ford says the new generation of BlueCruise will be 30% cheaper to build than the current technology.
articles.content: Ford is developing an AI assistant that will debut in the company’s smartphone app, before expanding to its vehicles in 2027, the company announced Wednesday at the 2026 Consumer Electronics Show. The company also teased a next-generation of its Blue... [1988 chars]
